title: Custom games problem
body:
Hi would like to say a few problems & some ideas that all players have that play custom games & would like to see some or all of these happen

1. The pause function is a completely useless function that it's only purpose is for trolls to ruin the game even more(best way to fix it is limit the use of the /pause to 3 times per user, remove it completely or allow games owners to disable this function 

2. Game owners need more rights ingame(& in lobby/team select) to deal with trolls or players that just ruin it for everyone else. For example, allow game owners to call a vote to kick/remove a player from the game ingame

3. i know kicking someone ingame will leave the other team 1 player short but could also add an option for the game owner(or other players) to invite someone to take over(they will still have all the gold, items & kdr the last person had before they were kicked), they obviously won't be able to change champ but will help the game become 

4. Allow game owners to undo a ban/kick in the lobby/team select as theres times you might kick the wrong person

5. Maybe have a minimizable separate chat box ingame(for any game) for whispers & have separate tabs for different conversations or could put it on the normal chat box but have tabs(like in some mmos)

6. Add a link to the riot support pages on the games menu(Next to settings button or in the help menu on the client)

these are needed for players who enjoy custom games(like Hide & seek & others)

replies.body: Made one in misc hope one of them see it though as it's an annoying issue in custom games

With a company like Riot, you'd think they would have already implemented these simple features in.

Nope.

Also, you'd probably want to move this discussion over to the [Player Creations board](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-creations), and if you want a red to see it, the [Miscellaneous](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous) board.

Best of luck!
